title: Drawing, "Jamaican Coast and Sky Seen from near Captain Kent, Bellevue, Jamaica", July 1865
medium: Graphite, brush and white gouache on green paper
markings:
Recto:  Stamped in ink, at lower left:  Lugt 457c
Verso:  Stamped in ink, at center: Lugt 457e
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at lower right:  Jamaica / July // 65 / near Capt [ain] Kent / Bellevue
description: Horizontal view from the hill range toward the sea with trees in the right foreground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Jamaican Coast and Sky Seen from near Captain Kent, Bellevue, Jamaica", July 1865.
July 1865. Graphite, brush and white gouache on green paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-392-c.
